file_content.text: Corellia is our home. We have defended the planet for generations. That time is over....
Corellia is under new management, Murthil.
Impressive work, my lord. These rebels were foolish to fight a Sith of your power.
Incredible that you took her down alone, sir. This Selonian has claimed many Imperial lives.
Incredible work bagging this Selonian, hunter. I see why the Empire pays you so well.
This was the heart of the resistance in Labor Valley. Thanks to you, it's stopped beating.
I am General Hesker, Imperial Guard. Darth Decimus sent us to assist.
I expected troop backup, not someone of your rank.
It's a pleasure, General.
The Imperial Guard responds to the most vital missions.
Awfully convenient for you to show up the second Murthil's down.
You're late.
The fleeing rebels slowed us. I had to cut through the tide to reach you.
We flanked the den and caved in the tunnels behind us. The rebels' transportation network is crushed.
As for the Selonians, Darth Decimus leaves their fate in your hands.
Introductions can wait.
Agreed. We caved in the tunnels leading to Axial Park, and the rest may not hold forever.
Before we move, Darth Decimus leaves you to decide the fate of the Selonians.
Please... my sept deserves life. Show mercy, and we follow the Empire.
We'll kill every last Selonian on Corellia, starting with you.
You deserve death, not mercy.
I will convey your orders. No Selonian will be spared.
Selonians will make good servants. But revolt again, and you're finished.
Mercy it is. Serve us well.
A Selonian's oath is stronger than fortified durasteel. I promise you loyalty.
Between Czerka Corellia, CEC and now the Selonians, you're recruiting quite the army. They'll serve us well against the Republic.
Finally we can focus on our fight with the Republic.
Corellia's once-pristine Axial Park is now a war zone. The Republic's desperately fighting to regain control. Darth Decimus hopes you'll lead our offensive.
We collapsed the tunnels leading out, so you must take a rocket tram to Axial Park. Meet me in our garrison. We'll crush them.
Hold the defenses! Lose the tunnels, and we lose Corellia!
Rest of you, stay. Drive the Imperials from our home.
Rest of you, stand tall. Show the hunter Selonians are not easy prey.
Rest of you, with me. Defend the den!
I've heard much of the Selonians' fearsome leader.
You must be Murthil.
Everyone on Corellia knows the name Murthil. My den has defended this planet for many years.
You're asking for it.
War is in our blood. Violence against the den is not smart.
Aw, the fuzzball's trying to intimidate me.
Am I supposed to be scared?
Selonians are fierce. Warrior's blood flows through our veins.
Call off your attack. Surrender your weapons.
I'll rest when Corellia serves the Empire.
Never.
Republic, Empire... politics mean nothing to Selonians. We fight because you invade our home.
Take my lightsaber. It won't bite.
[Lie] You win. We surrender.
Take my blaster... as a sign of good faith.
[Lie] You win. We surrender.
Remain still. Destha--take the weapon.
Liar! End this one!
Snakes! End their lives!
I'd rather hear what a Selonian scream sounds like.
Violence is more my style.
For the den! For Corellia!
